name: San Francisco Human Services Agency - WIC Clinic
description: The SFHSA WIC Clinic helps low-income mothers and their children apply for the WIC Supplemental Nutrition Program to access the following services: - WIC card to purchase healthy foods at the grocery store - Nutrition education - Breastfeeding support - Healthcare referrals Eligibility: - Pregnant or breastfeeding women - Recently had a baby or have an infant or children under the age of 5 years - Family income meets the WIC income guidelines - Enrolled in Medi-Cal, CalWORKs (TANF) or CalFresh (
